title: RZEEN
author: RZEEN
content: Hello kindly need members help to get overclocking software for avalon 1246 ( 88 th) appreciated

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: There is no software yet for overclocking it. Why do you want to overclock this unit? is it hashrate drop? There is an option under the configuration of this unit to choose either normal mode or performance mode. Or you can try to play with the FMS app and use "diagnose" and send the commands below 537 to 612 these might be frequencies increasing it might force your miner to run overclocked.Code:[{"command":"ascset","parameter":"0,aging-parame-ter,60-537:562:587:612"}]Take note never tested it but you can try and be careful it might also need more power and it can lead to PSU failure.Just in case send this command below for auto tuning your miner.Code:[{"command":"ascset", "parameter":"0,aging-set,1"}]

comments.author: mikeywith
comments.body: Quote from: RZEEN on July 02, 2022, 12:22:29 PMHello kindly need members help to get overclocking software for avalon 1246 ( 88 th) appreciated As far as I know, there is NONE, anyone who approaches you with such software is probably trying to scam you or they will inject your miner with some sort of a virus and steal your hashrate, be very careful.Besides, the Avalon 1246 hardly runs stable at its stock hashrate, even if there was a solid firmware that overclocks it, you shouldn't be risking it.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: mikeywith on July 03, 2022, 12:46:02 AMQuote from: RZEEN on July 02, 2022, 12:22:29 PMHello kindly need members help to get overclocking software for avalon 1246 ( 88 th) appreciated As far as I know, there is NONE, anyone who approaches you with such software is probably trying to scam you or they will inject your miner with some sort of a virus and steal your hashrate, be very careful.Besides, the Avalon 1246 hardly runs stable at its stock hashrate, even if there was a solid firmware that overclocks it, you shouldn't be risking it.he should down clock it unless the room is 30c or 84f or cooler.Most all gear does not run well pushed hard unless the cooling is spectacular.

comments.author: kano
comments.body: Quote from: mikeywith on July 03, 2022, 12:46:02 AMQuote from: RZEEN on July 02, 2022, 12:22:29 PMHello kindly need members help to get overclocking software for avalon 1246 ( 88 th) appreciated As far as I know, there is NONE, anyone who approaches you with such software is probably trying to scam you or they will inject your miner with some sort of a virus and steal your hashrate, be very careful.Besides, the Avalon 1246 hardly runs stable at its stock hashrate, even if there was a solid firmware that overclocks it, you shouldn't be risking it.Odd you should say that the A1246 doesn't run stable.The 54 x A1246 I have run fine averaging 96THThey are 'in' summer now also.Also ... while I don't, you can increase performance using information provided by canaan.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: kano on July 06, 2022, 12:46:55 PMQuote from: mikeywith on July 03, 2022, 12:46:02 AMQuote from: RZEEN on July 02, 2022, 12:22:29 PMHello kindly need members help to get overclocking software for avalon 1246 ( 88 th) appreciated As far as I know, there is NONE, anyone who approaches you with such software is probably trying to scam you or they will inject your miner with some sort of a virus and steal your hashrate, be very careful.Besides, the Avalon 1246 hardly runs stable at its stock hashrate, even if there was a solid firmware that overclocks it, you shouldn't be risking it.Odd you should say that the A1246 doesn't run stable.The 54 x A1246 I have run fine averaging 96THThey are 'in' summer now also.Also ... while I don't, you can increase performance using information provided by canaan.my lone a1246 is perfect on low speed in an 85-95f room
